rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0001
rows.name:
Nebulous cloudy peaks...
For whom do you tower, looking
down from your lofty heights?

rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0002
rows.name:
I'm trying to encapsulate my idea of
the Cloud Sea ridge through poetry,
but it's proving very difficult...

rows.label: tlk4170042103_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, I do enjoy searching for new ways
to express myself. Thank you so very
much for having invited me here.
